MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK6 postcode area of Denny, affecting properties in Glenbo Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.24pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Hayfield Terrace substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.34pm on Thursday 3rd December 2020.
